subject: Tennis
Cheating
Gambling
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Adam Lewis, a London-based lawyer selected to scrutinize the sport’s internal integrity unit, has close ties to tennis and has divided experts in sports law, some of whom think he was the wrong pick.
snippet: Adam Lewis, a London-based lawyer selected to scrutinize the sport’s internal integrity unit, has close ties to tennis and has divided experts in sports law, some of whom think he was the wrong pick.
